title: REGISTER FOR EVENT
para1: NWC Association along with IoT Alliance - An AICTE SPICES funded clubT is planning to conduct a series of technical as well as non technical events starting from 20th of September, 2022 and the applications are open for all the students of SRMIST, Chennai who want to compete in the events. The events include technical writing contest, e-Sports, Website Creation, Photography and Reels/short video making contest, poster presentation and prototyping and many more. The best performers will be awarded with some exciting prizes. The interested students and research scholars are requested to fill the form(Link & QR Code in brochure attached).
para2: For any queries, feel free to contact us via mail on nwc.srmist@gmail.com or on our Instagram handle @nwcsrmist.
